question: Which state announced to give free laptops to 500 meritorious students who secure a minimum of 95 per cent marks in Class X Board examination?
explanation: Haryana Chief minister Manohar Lal Khattar announced to give free laptops to 500 meritorious students who secure a minimum of 95 per cent marks in Class X Board examination this year. It will be provided under State Merit Scholarship scheme.
